text:
Venezia Football Club, commonly known as just Venezia FC or Venezia, is a football club that plays in Venice, Italy.
The club play their home games at Stadio Pierluigi Penzo. The stadium was opened in 1913. It is the second oldest stadium in Italy, with the oldest one being Genoa's Stadio Luigi Ferraris. The stadium is also notable because it is easily accessible by boat, and even has parking spaces for boats.
The club are currently planning a new stadium that will be located near Marco Polo Airport, away from Venice Island.
